title: Serious Lag Issues in game
body: I know there are fixes out there in the forums but so far nothing has worked for me, just in the past few days I have been getting huge spikes of ping resulting in lag and disconnects. If you have any ideas please post them below, thank you.

replies.body: After the recent maintenance I can vouch for this, Huge ping difference might aswell go play NA lool

Hey ZFearik

What was your ping before/after the maintenance?  It shouldn't have changed much at all with the changes we made.

Mindstar
